Stop by or give us a call at 843-573-0100 Baroni's Pizza - Ashley Crossing Shopping Center, Charleston, SC Welcome to Baroni's Pizza! we're Hot, Fresh, and Saucy. What's not to like? Baroni’s Pizza – West Ashley’s ORIGINAL New York Pizzeria We're Hot, Fresh, and Saucy. What's not to like? When Tony and Barbara Baroni moved from New York to West Ashley in the early 1980s, they quickly realized something was missing – So in 1983 they set up shop and began serving their new community the best in traditional, hand-tossed New York pizza made the right way – with generations-old family recipes and those same delicious flavors they loved back home! authentic New York-style pizza. What began as a small neighborhood pizzeria quickly grew into a local favorite. As word spread, so did our menu – adding hot and cold “grinders” (sandwiches), homemade pastas, fresh salads, and other classic Italian offerings. By 1997, we had outgrown our first kitchen and moved into our current home in the Ashley Crossing Shopping Center. Since then, Baroni’s has remained a beloved mainstay in West Ashley and Charleston for generations of families who know and love the true taste of New York pizza. At Baroni’s, we believe great food starts with great ingredients and a commitment to doing things the right way – the way. Our dough is made fresh in-house every day, our produce is hand-selected daily, and we never use artificial additives or preservatives. Every dish is made to order with the utmost care, using only premium ingredients and attention to quality. old-school We take pride in doing things the old-fashioned way, where quality and hospitality come first. Our generous portions, fair prices, and great taste have kept families coming back for over four decades. Check out our reviews on Google and Facebook and see why our customers say Baroni’s feels like family. More importantly, come and taste for yourself the difference tradition makes – because sometimes, the old way really the best way! is That’s the Baroni’s way, and it’s been our promise since day one. Bada-Boom! read more about us our menu Fast Delivery In West Ashley! We bring the heat to your doorstep Experience the true taste of New York at your home with our stone-oven-baked pizzas, loaded with crisp crusts and flavorful toppings. Enjoy hearty sandwiches and rich pastas, all prepared to satisfy any craving. Whether you want a classic slice or a comforting pasta, every dish is made to please.
